definition: a long staff with one end being hook-shaped, to bend or cause to bend
details:
noun
- a long staff with one end being hook-shaped
= example: a long staff with one end being hook-shaped
= synonyms: shepherd's crook
- someone who has committed a crime or has been legally convicted of a crime
= example: someone who has committed a crime or has been legally convicted of a crime
= synonyms: criminal
- a circular segment of a curve
= example: a circular segment of a curve
= synonyms: twist
verb
- to bend or cause to bend
= example: to bend or cause to bend
= synonyms: curve
